section.title: What Our Guests Say
section.subtitle: Read authentic reviews from our valued guests

reviews.name: Amanda Lee
reviews.comment: Absolutely amazing stay! The rooms were spotless, staff was friendly, and the service exceeded expectations.

reviews.name: Daniel Roberts
reviews.comment: Beautiful hotel with excellent facilities. The pool and spa were highlights of our stay.

reviews.name: Sophia Martinez
reviews.comment: Luxurious experience from start to finish. Highly recommended for a relaxing getaway.
